data.title: BTS’s “Fake Love” Receives Platinum Certification By Recording Industry Association Of Japan
data.meta_description: K-Pop idol group BTS has obtained the platinum certification for "Fake Love" by the Recording Industry Association of Japan.
data.text:
K-Pop idol group BTS have now received platinum and gold certifications for a total of four songs from the Record Industry Association of Japan. According to the RIAJ, their song, “Fake Love”, was certified platinum as of April of this year.

In addition, “Mikrokosmos” and “I NEED U” have both received gold certification as well. On the other hand, their song, “Dynamite”, obtained the double platinum certification this past March, and also was listed as diamond certification this January.
